thread.title: Sony Xperia MWC 2017 announcement event livestream
thread.title_full: Sony Xperia MWC 2017 announcement event livestream

title: Sony Xperia MWC 2017 announcement event livestream
text: Sony Xperia MWC 2017 announcement event livestream Sony Xperia MWC 2017 announcement event livestream Posted: Tags : Sony - Sony + MWC2017 - MWC2017 + Sony will livestream the announcement of its newest Xperia phones from Mobile World Congress (MWC) 2017 in beautiful Barcelona, Spain, and you can watch the new Sony Xperia unveiliing right above. Sony is expected to bring a few new devices, including a brand new flagship phone that could have truly all-out specs and a new design. We expect a mid ranger and a couple of affordable phones, and why not a surprise from Sony. The company that is now better known for its consoles, sensors and content creation, still has some solid Android phones that it sells globally. Let's see if this time it can reach for the very heights of the smartphone market.
